name: Black Hills Aero
about: Black Hills Aero, located in Spearfish, South Dakota, is a comprehensive aviation service provider that includes a flying school among its offerings. Founded with a passion for aviation, Black Hills Aero offers flight lessons for both hobbyists and aspiring professional pilots. The school is part of a broader aviation services company that also provides plane maintenance, charter flights, hangar space, and avionics services. With a commitment to safety and excellence, Black Hills Aero aims to bring the wonder of flight to its community, offering a welcoming and professional environment for all aviation needs. Our goal is to provide top-notch training and services, ensuring our students and clients receive the best possible experience in aviation.
